about_the_game:
Alone, Emmer traverses strange and dangerous lands to avenge her family and kill the dragon who burnt her home to the ground. But monsters aren't always the scary things that lurk in the shadows.

The Milk Lake is an intense, atmospheric sword-combat action RPG with horror and stealth elements. The character animation is synthesized in realtime by a deep neural network, creating fluid, realistic human motion that helps to connect with the protagonist and maintain the player's immersion in the game world.

  • A combination of frantic and time-dependent combat
  • Unique, large format Shadow of the Colossus-esque baddies
  • Deep, lore-rich world that reveals itself through story and gameplay
  • Moral decision-driven character building
  • Dark fantasy environments

content_descriptors.notes: There is combat in the game, with injury and death to the main character and enemies.

name: The Milk Lake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Alone, Emmer traverses strange and dangerous lands to avenge her family and kill the dragon who burnt her home to the ground. But monsters aren't always the scary things that lurk in the shadows. The Milk Lake is an intense, atmospheric sword-combat action RPG about the true nature of evil.
